actions.bridge_gap_description: Build a bridge to cross the gap
actions.build_out_beacon_description: Makes exploration in surrounding sectors easier
actions.build_out_luxury_outpost_description: Gives access to the luxury resource, making workers happier.
actions.build_out_tradepost_connector_descriptio: Allows traders and workers to cross the level safely.
actions.claim_milestone_description: Unlock new milestone and new undertakings.
actions.clear_debris_description: Clear the debris blocking the way.
actions.clear_workshop_description: Scout the workshop to see if it can be used.
actions.flee_description: Abandon what you were doing and run.
actions.improve_in_hospital_description: Reduce treatment costs and enable augmentations
actions.improve_in_tradepost_description: Decrease stamina cost of moving from this camp directly to another
actions.launch_description: Leave this planet and launch for the great unknown.
actions.move_camp_global_description: Shortcut to the camp on this level.
actions.move_camp_level_description: Shortcut back to the nearest camp.
actions.move_level_down_description: Use the passage to move one level down
actions.move_level_up_description: Use the passage to move one level up
actions.nap_description: Sleep rough and regain a bit of stamina.
actions.scout_locale_i_description: Find out if there is anyone living here.
actions.scout_locale_u_description: Scout for additional resources and evidence.
actions.use_in_hospital_2_description: Add implants that improve overall health
actions.use_in_library_description: Study the records and collect more evidence
actions.use_in_temple_description: Donate silver for hope with the spirits
actions.use_item_glowstick_1_description: Create a temporary light in this location.

improvements.barracks_description_default: Houses soldiers that improve camp defences.
improvements.beacon_description_default: Shines a light over a large area, making scavenging less dangerous.
improvements.campfire_description_default: Increases rumour generation and unlocks upgrades.
improvements.cementmill_description_default: Enables production of a new kind of construction material.
improvements.garden_description_default: A dash of beauty in the concrete desert.
improvements.house_description_default: A place for {num} people to stay.
improvements.inn_description_default: Increases rumours and enables recruiting followers.
improvements.lights_description_default: Keep the darkness at bay for good.
improvements.robotFactory_description_default: Enables production and storage of worker robots.
improvements.shrine_description_default: A place to connect to the strange spirits.
improvements.square_description_default: A place to relax and socialize.
improvements.stable_description_default: Space to set up a trading caravan.
improvements.temple_description_default: A central location for religious and cultural activities.
improvements.tradepost_description_default: Connect camps to a trade network.

milestones._milestone_00_description: Build a space just for relaxation and socializing.

stats._vision_description: Makes exploration safer and scavenging more effective

upgrades._square_description: Build a space just for relaxation and socializing.
upgrades.improve_building_apothecary_description: Rediscovered modern technology for disease prevention and treatment.
upgrades.improve_building_barracks_3_description: Establish more roles within the barracks to keep things running efficiently
upgrades.improve_building_campfire_1_description: Turn the campfire into the pride of the settlement.
upgrades.improve_building_campfire_2_description: Improve the campfire to be a gathering place for the whole settlement.
upgrades.improve_building_cementmill_description: New cement mixture for stronger concrete.
upgrades.improve_building_collector_food_2_descri: Improve traps so they can collect more food.
upgrades.improve_building_collector_water_2_descr: Improve buckets and collect more water.
upgrades.improve_building_hospital_3_description: Make hospital visits less traumatic and enable new implants.
upgrades.improve_building_hospital_description: Complex procedures for fixing the human body.
upgrades.improve_building_house2_description: Build higher tower blocks with room for more people
upgrades.improve_building_inn_description: Another useful way to raise spirits and bond groups.
upgrades.improve_building_library2_description: An organized approach to growing new knowledge
upgrades.improve_building_library_description: A more systematic approach to knowledge gathering and preservation. Will enable more specialized workers later on.
upgrades.improve_building_market2_description: Further improve trade by using lighter currency that is easier to carry around.
upgrades.improve_building_market3_description: Partially restore the Network that (according to legends) used to cover the whole City.
upgrades.improve_building_market_description: Common medium of exchange makes trading more efficient.
upgrades.improve_building_radiotower_description: Improve the radio station and send messages over longer distances
upgrades.improve_building_robots_description: Improve robot factories to produce more robots.
upgrades.improve_building_shrine_description: Another way to find answers to questions.
upgrades.improve_building_stable_2_description: Improve caravan capacity by bringing more pack animals
upgrades.improve_building_stable_description: Managing bigger caravans that can carry more goods
upgrades.improve_building_storage1_description: Keeping other animals away from food and materials for more reliable storage.
upgrades.improve_building_temple2_description: Perhaps the spirits would appreciate offerings of food, jewelry, bones, plants, or clothing?
upgrades.improve_building_temple3_description: Expand temples into places where anyone can come meditate.
upgrades.improve_worker_chemist_2_description: Rediscovering the study of substances and chemical reactions.
upgrades.improve_worker_cleric_2_description: Bring the community closer together with shared rituals
upgrades.improve_worker_cleric_3_description: Use scripture to store knowledge about the spirits - and allow clerics assert their authority.
upgrades.improve_worker_gardener_2_description: Develop different herb species to survive better in the new conditions
upgrades.improve_worker_gardener_3_description: Automated irrigation systems to increase greenhouse yield
upgrades.improve_worker_rubber_2_description: Better processing techniques for rubber production
upgrades.improve_worker_rubber_3_description: A new kind of rubber, quicker to produce
upgrades.improve_worker_scavenger_2_description: Processing technique that allows more metal left behind by previous inhabitants to be salvaged.
upgrades.improve_worker_scavenger_3_description: Further process scavenged metal so that metal from sources previously unworkable become usable again
upgrades.improve_worker_scavenger_4_description: Take advantage of the most advanced materials left behind by previous civilizations
upgrades.improve_worker_scientist_description: Add dedicated working spaces to the libraries
upgrades.improve_worker_smith_2_description: Improve metal working techniques and allow toolsmiths to work more efficiently
upgrades.improve_worker_smith_3_description: Modularity is the basis of mass production
upgrades.improve_worker_trapper_2_description: Salting, smoking and pickling food to make it last longer.
upgrades.improve_worker_trapper_3_description: Processed foods last longer and enable using ingredients otherwise too unpleasant, ultimately improving efficiency of trappers
upgrades.improve_worker_water_2_description: Techniques for large-scale filtering and disinfecting drinking water that permit using more water sources.
upgrades.improve_worker_water_3_description: Get more out of all water that is collected
upgrades.unlock_action_clear_waste_r_description: Allow clearing some radioactive waste in the environment.
upgrades.unlock_action_clear_waste_t_description: Allow clearing some toxic waste in the environment.
upgrades.unlock_building_apothecary_description: Basic knowledge of making herbal medicines.
upgrades.unlock_building_aqueduct_description: Tapping into the decaying water infrastructure and extending it to efficiently store and convey water.
upgrades.unlock_building_barracks_description: A dedicated and trained class of workers for protecting the camp.
upgrades.unlock_building_beacon_description: Lights out in the city that make exploration less dangerous.
upgrades.unlock_building_cementmill_description: Unlocks the production of concrete, a strong and versatile building material.
upgrades.unlock_building_fortifications_descripti: Constructions to keep unwelcome strangers away.
upgrades.unlock_building_generator_description: Build simple generators that provide electricity to the settlement, improving overall quality of life.
upgrades.unlock_building_greenhouse_description: Grow herbs in some rare locations in the City where conditions are right.
upgrades.unlock_building_house2_description: Reclaiming tower blocks that can house more people.
upgrades.unlock_building_inn_description: Sometimes travellers pass by the camp. Perhaps we can offer them a place to sleep?
upgrades.unlock_building_library_description: Concentrated effort to build and store knowledge.
upgrades.unlock_building_lights_description: Lights that defeat the darkness in the camp once and for all.
upgrades.unlock_building_market_description: Trade with people from foreign camps and cooperatives.
upgrades.unlock_building_passage_elevator_descrip: Repairing elevators that allow passage to new levels.
upgrades.unlock_building_passage_hole_description: Enables building passages to bridge levels when there is no existing staircase or elevator.
upgrades.unlock_building_passage_staircase_descri: Managing large building projects and building structures that allow passage to different levels.
upgrades.unlock_building_radio_description: Build radio towers to increase your civilization's reputation.
upgrades.unlock_building_researchcenter_descripti: Places to generate new knowledge instead of just collecting and archiving the old.
upgrades.unlock_building_robots_description: Build robots that can help workers do their jobs more efficiently.
upgrades.unlock_building_smithy_description: Smiths can turn scrap metal into tools and weapons.
upgrades.unlock_building_spaceship1_description: Plans for a hull of a colony space ship that can leave this planet and travel far.
upgrades.unlock_building_spaceship2_description: Shield for a colony space ship that can protect it from the dangers of space.
upgrades.unlock_building_spaceship3_description: Technology required to support life on the colony ship for an extended period of time.
upgrades.unlock_building_square_description: Build a space just for relaxation and socializing.
upgrades.unlock_building_stable_description: Travel to other factions to trade for goods.
upgrades.unlock_building_tradingpost_description: Establish basic trade routes between camps, allowing them to share resources.
upgrades.unlock_item_bag_1_description: The art of crafting durable items out of leather.
upgrades.unlock_item_clothing2_description: The craft of making clothes out of fabric.
upgrades.unlock_item_clothing3_description: A standardised outfit that offers basic protection.
upgrades.unlock_item_clothing3h_description: Good gloves to keep explorers safe
upgrades.unlock_item_clothing4_description: Basic protective clothing to give an edge in fights.
upgrades.unlock_item_clothing4h_description: Create and manipulate new, stronger fibers for better protection and easier manufacturing.
upgrades.unlock_item_clothing5_description: Adapting the new metal working techniques for protection.
upgrades.unlock_item_clothing6_description: Techniques for improving existing clothing for exploration
upgrades.unlock_item_clothing_body_13_description: Even better use of spider silk and recycled materials.
upgrades.unlock_item_clothing_body_15_description: Augmented clothing made to withstand the harshest of environments.
upgrades.unlock_item_clothing_hands_25_descriptio: Gloves are a scavenger's best tool.
upgrades.unlock_item_clothing_head_5_description: The art of making some serious helmets.
upgrades.unlock_item_clothing_over_15_description: Modern armour that takes inspiration from military automatons.
upgrades.unlock_item_clothingl14_description: Clothing to protect from radiactive environments.
upgrades.unlock_item_scavenger_gear_description: New techniques for improving old designs.
upgrades.unlock_item_shoe1_description: The skill of making useful things out of whatever happens to be available
upgrades.unlock_item_weapon_10_description: A gun that allows the user to fire multiple rounds without reloading.
upgrades.unlock_item_weapon_12_description: A powerful firearm that is particularly devastating in close range
upgrades.unlock_item_weapon_13_description: Unlocks a new class of lethal weapons.
upgrades.unlock_item_weapon_14_description: Taking weapons and fighting to a new level of destructiveness.
upgrades.unlock_item_weapon_15_description: Knowledge to make the deadliest weapons.
upgrades.unlock_item_weapon_2_description: Slightly more reliable than the shiv.
upgrades.unlock_item_weapon_6_description: A deadly ranged weapon crafted from fairly simple materials.
upgrades.unlock_item_weapon_8_description: Better techniques for metal-working allow better weapons and more tools.
upgrades.unlock_project_tradingpost_connector_des: A massive elevator, spanning a whole level, and allowing traders bypass entire hazardous environment.
upgrades.unlock_worker_rope_description: Using scavenged fiber and cloth to make rope, a useful building and crafting material.

sector_descriptions._example_01: [A] [narrow] [street] between two [monolithic] [huts]. Both water and food can be collected here. There is a camp here.
sector_descriptions._example_02: [A] [narrow] [street] between two [monolithic] [huts]. Both water and food can be collected here. There is a camp here.

sector_status._enemies_message: There are some hostile creatures here. Scavenging is more risky.

camp._tooltip_raid_danger_description: Increases with camp size and decreases with camp defences.
camp.events_none_description: All is quiet in the camp.

embark.page_description: Make sure you pack enough supplies before you leave.
embark.warning_low_food_description: There won't be much food left in the camp.
embark.warning_low_stamina_description: Won't get far with low stamina.
embark.warning_low_supplies_description: Won't get far without food and water.
embark.warning_low_water_description: There won't be much water left in the camp.

exploration.sector_status_no_enemies_description: There doesn't seem to be anything hostile around.
exploration.sector_status_not_scouted_description: You have not scouted this sector yet.

map._level_status_unexplored_description: There are still many unvisited streets on this level.
map.sector_details_empty_info_ascii: Select a sector to see details.
map.sector_details_empty_info_canvas: Click on a sector to see details.

meta._game_info_wip_description: Note that this game is still in development and many features are incomplete and unbalanced. Updates might break saves. Feedback and bug reports are appreciated!

tribe.status_no_news_message: No news from other camps at the moment.
tribe.status_no_trade_message: Camp on level {level} can't trade resources with other camps.
tribe.status_outgoing_caravan_message: Outgoing caravan on level {level} (expected to return in {timeUntil}).
tribe.status_raid_message: There has been a raid on level {level} ({timeSince} ago). We need better defences.
tribe.status_sunlit_message: Camp on level {level} is exposed to direct sunlight.
tribe.status_trader_message: There is a trader ({name}) currently on level {level}.
tribe.status_unused_greenhouse_message: Level {level} camp has access to a Greenhouse but no Gardeners working in it.
tribe.status_unused_plantation_message: Level {level} camp has access to a plantation but no Rubbermakers working in it.
tribe.status_unused_refinery_message: Level {level} camp has access to a Refinery but no Chemists working in it.
tribe.status_visitor_message: There is a visitor currently on level {level}.

upgrades.upgrade_details_none_selected_hint: Click on an upgrade to see details.
